name: ARBORETUM (Sleeprunner Studios)
description:
The last tree on earth is being attacked by fire elementals. Protect it at any cost.

Build Traps and Turrets to hold back the fire elementals! Extinguish the flames to save the tree! Attack the brutes with your magic abilites! ... and get Help from your Twitch community!

ARBORETUM is a contribution for the Franken Game Jam 2021 and was made within 48 hours.

CONTROLS Keyboard WASDMoveMouseLook AroundSpaceJump EInteractLMBCast Magic / Extinguish Flames A Game by

             

  • Sebastian Kuehn (Website | Twitter) - Game Design | Programming | Level Design | Technical Art
  • Josef Buchner (Twitter) - Game Design | Lead Programming
  • Tim Keil (Twitter) - Programming | Animation | Game Design
  • Andreas Moder (Instagram) - Programming | VFX
  • Johannes Monsch (Artstation | Instagram) - 3D Art
  • Emily Panzer - 3D Art
  • Steffen Schreiber (Soundcloud) - Music | SFX
